content.raw:
I'm new looking into this, so please bare with my most basic questions :)

If I understood well, the files under `./include` are used by the plugins under `./system`, correct? Wouldn't it be a cleaner organization if all the files used by a plugin were contained in the same directory? See my proposal on issue #7.

Also, as I understand it, we will have a `RenderingSystem` which lives in this repo eventually, right? If so, I vote for naming these files closer to how we want them to be in the end (remove `dummy` and `dumb`). Even though they aren't in their final form, I think this gives everyone a better feel of how things fit together and where we can plug them into.
